00028         class Shape : public DisplayObject {    
00029         protected:
00030                 float color[3];
00031

00033                 float strokeSize;
00034

00036                 // constructor
00037                 Shape(DisplayObject *p, int x=0, int y=0, float r=0.0, float g=0.0, float b=0.0, float sr=0.0, float sg=0.0, float sb=0.0, float strSize=5.0, double rot=0.0, double s=1.0, double o=1.0)
00038                         :DisplayObject(p,x,y,0,0,rot,s,o){

00040                         color[0] = r;
00041                         color[1] = g;
00042                         color[2] = b;
00043                         
00044                         strokeColor[0] = sr;
00045                         strokeColor[1] = sg;
00046                         strokeColor[2] = sb;
00047                         strokeColor[3] = 1.0;
00048                         
00049                         strokeSize = strSize;
00050                 }       
00051                 virtual ~Shape(){}
00052                 
00053                 void setFillColor(float r=0.0, float g=0.0, float b=0.0)
00054                 {
00055                         color[0] = r;
00056                         color[1] = g;
00057                         color[2] = b;
00058                 }
00059                 
00060                 void setStrokeColor(float r=0.0, float g=0.0, float b=0.0)
00061                 {
00062                         strokeColor[0] = r;
00063                         strokeColor[1] = g;
00064                         strokeColor[2] = b;
00065                 }
00066                 
00067                 void getFillColor(float &r, float &g, float &b)
00068                 {
00069                         r = color[0];
00070                         g = color[1];
00071                         b = color[2];
00072                 }
00073                 
00074                 void getStrokeColor(float &r, float &g, float &b)
00075                 {
00076                         r = strokeColor[0];
00077                         g = strokeColor[1];
00078                         b = strokeColor[2];
00079                 }
